title: A Short History Of Nearly Everything.zip
description:
This upload is all the 300 or so files from this torrent http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4297757/Bill_Bryson_-_A_Short_History_of_Nearly_Everything that has been organised into 30 chapters and the overlapping audio at the end of one disk and the beginning of another disk has been removed. also the disk number announcement has also been removed.

Trimmed and joined with MP3Trimmer which edits mp3 files without recoding so they are the same quality as the original mp3 files which is very good.
